forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
